description.value:
Trigger You regain Hit Points while you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious].

When you escape death, you return to life with retributive fire that burns those who harmed you. You expend 1 Mythic Point, return to consciousness, Stand, and regain additional Hit Points equal to your level. You then erupt in flames, dealing fire damage equal to twice your level (@Damage[(2*@actor.level)[fire]]) to adjacent foes, with a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC. Foes that critically fail the save are also pushed 5 feet away from you.
